item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-04-29
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Panara Bread. #
  • Waiting @ the gate, off to Orlando in a bit! (@ Jet Blue Gate C36 -- Boston Logan International Airport) #
  • Grabbing some pad Thai. (@ Pei Wei Asian Diner) #
  • Grabbing supplies & setting up the catering for sis-in-laws baby shower. (@ Whole Foods Market) #
